effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. The greater the user’s Speed compared to the target’s, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150. User’s Speed | Power -------------------------------- | ----: Up to 2× the target’s Speed | 60 Up to 3× the target’s Speed | 80 Up to 4× the target’s Speed | 120 More than 4× the target’s Speed | 150
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. The greater the user’s Speed compared to the target’s, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150. User’s Speed | Power -------------------------------- | ----: Up to 2× the target’s Speed | 60 Up to 3× the target’s Speed | 80 Up to 4× the target’s Speed | 120 More than 4× the target’s Speed | 150

short_effect.x_y: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.

flavor_text.x_y: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power.
